answers.answer: Hello and welcome!Anorexia and bulimia are eating disorders which can affect a person health significantly if left untreated. They can lead to high blood pressure and cholesterol, and an inclination toward developing heart disease, gall bladder disease, or type II diabetes. Gas and bloating can also be due to gastro esophageal reflux disease, peptic ulcer disease .Seek the opinion of a professional trained on handling patients with eating disorders. Hope it sincerely helps.Take care and best luck!

question: hi. i have a daughter who has seen doctor after doctor. they ran all kinds of tests and it shows nothing except that her gall bladder is not working she has had anorxia and bulimia for several years. she has stomach pain when she eas and has bloating. she has lost a lot of weight and she says she can eat  only certain foods.. do you think that it anorxia causing all of this???
title: mother about daughter
